title: CyberLink Power2Go Platinum 9.0.1601.0 Multilingual + Cyberlink.
description:
================
 [INFO:]
 ================

CyberLink Power2Go Platinum 9.0.1601.0 Multilingual + Cyberlink.All.Software-Multi.Patch.FIXED-REiS | 231 MB

 CyberLink Power2Go is the all-media disc burning software, adding drag-and-drop burning support for Windows 7. The latest version of Cyberlink's software also improved support for blue-laser disc burning, supporting CD, DVD, Blu-ray Disc, and HD DVD data burning. The update adds drag-and-drop burning using Power2Go's Windows Sidebar gadget, enabling easy burning via Windows 7, instant location of files by searching using file name or tag information, drag-and-drop thumbnail layout for creating discs of photo slideshows and videos, password protection and encryption for data burning and unlimited MP3 ripping, file conversion, and other music CD utilities.

 The All-Media Disc Burning Software:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Burn data onto Blu-ray Discs and HD DVDs
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create video and photo DVDs, burn audio CDs, and rip MP3s
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Search and locate files instantly using file names or tags
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Secure discs with encryption and password protection
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Drag-and-drop files to burn via the Power2Go sidebar gadget

 Key features in version:
 * CD, DVD, Blu-ray Disc, and HD DVD data burning
 * Drag-and-drop burning using Power2Go's Windows Sidebar gadget, enabling easy burning via Windows Vista
 * Instant location of files by searching using file name or tag information
 * Drag-and-drop thumbnail layout for creating discs of photo slideshows and videos
 * Password protection and encryption for data burning
 * Unlimited MP3 ripping, file conversion, and other music CD utilities

 Drag-and-Drop burning:
 * Windows Sidebar Gadget Ã¢â‚¬â€ drag-and-drop then burn files directly via the Windows Sidebar.
 * MP3 ripping and audio file conversion Ã¢â‚¬â€ take your favorite CDs and quickly create files for playback on a music player or your home media center PC.
 * New-look interface Ã¢â‚¬â€ feel right at home with the new look of Windows Vista; easier navigation and a cleaner design.

 Burn any disc, any file:
 * Burn any disc and any fileData burning Ã¢â‚¬â€ burn a huge amount of data to disc, on CDs, DVDs, Blu-ray Discs and HD DVDs.
 * Video and photo disc authoring Ã¢â‚¬â€ create discs of videos and photo slideshows that play on a home DVD player.
 * Creation of Audio CDs Ã¢â‚¬â€ create compilation CDs.
 * Mixed media CDs Ã¢â‚¬â€ burn data files and audio files onto the same disc, play your music on your CD player, then access data on your PC.

 Search and burn:
 * Search for files quickly using tags or titlesSimplified burning process Ã¢â‚¬â€ find files in an instant, search using tags or titles.
 * Drag to burn Ã¢â‚¬â€ drag complete folders or individual files in one easy step.
 * Disc capacity bar Ã¢â‚¬â€ manage the number of files you can burn for your current disc media using the easy-to-read capacity bar.
 * Burner settings Ã¢â‚¬â€ take control of the burning process with speed, data settings, auto-run, and other burning options.

 Safeguard your data:
 * Secured data disc Ã¢â‚¬â€add a password and encrypt to ensure better protection.
 * Disc copying Ã¢â‚¬â€ create perfect duplicates of your discs.
 * Erase disc and disc image utilities Ã¢â‚¬â€ save or burn disc images, erase and re-use re-writable discs.


 Platform : Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 8.1
 Language : Multilanguage
